alfredsnippet.snippet: mkdir -p "${HOME}/.ssh" && mkdir -p "${HOME}/.huggingface" && mkdir -p "${HOME}/.aws" && beaker session create --secret-mount ssh-key="${HOME}/.ssh/id_rsa" --secret-mount aws-cred="${HOME}/.aws/credentials" --secret-mount huggingface-token="${HOME}/.huggingface/token" --secret-env S2_KEY=S2_KEY --secret-env OPENAI_API_KEY=OPENAI_API_KEY --secret-env WANDB_API_KEY=WANDB_API_KEY -i docker://ghcr.io/allenai/cuda:11.5-cudnn8-dev-ubuntu20.04-v1.2.8
alfredsnippet.name: Beaker Defaults
